description: This file defines a Flutter widget for a reports screen in an attendance tracker app. It manages loading and displaying weekly attendance data, allows class selection, and updates the display accordingly.

classes.name: ReportsScreen
classes.description: A Flutter StatefulWidget that displays attendance reports with class selection and weekly chart.

classes.name: _ReportsScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the logic and UI for ReportsScreen, including data loading and widget building.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state, loading class and weekly data asynchronously.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the reports screen, including dropdown for class selection, refresh button, and weekly chart display.
